title: How to Make Cinnamon Crinkles

steps.headline: Combine sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl.
Separate egg whites from yolks.set yolks aside.
Put egg whites and water in a small bowl.
Using an electric mixer; combine butter,egg yolks,and vanilla.
Gradually add cake mix, beat until well blended.
Roll a rounded teaspoon of dough into egg white/water mixture and then into cinnamon sugar.
Place balls two inches apart on a cookie sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until edges are golden brown.

text: Preheat oven to 375 °F (191 °C).  Combine sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl.  Separate egg whites from yolks.set yolks aside.  Put egg whites and water in a small bowl.  Using an electric mixer; combine butter,egg yolks,and vanilla.  Gradually add cake mix, beat until well blended.  Roll a rounded teaspoon of dough into egg white/water mixture and then into cinnamon sugar.  Place balls two inches apart on a cookie sheet.  Bake for 10-12 minutes until edges are golden brown.  Cool 2 minutes on cooling racks.  Store in airtight containers.
